SLIDE1.TITLE: Welcome to Stay@Home!
SLIDE1.PARAGRAPH: This app was made so that staying at home stays fun in these quarantine times.

SLIDE2.TITLE: Stay at home and make your forest grow
SLIDE2.PARAGRAPH: Whenever you stay at home, after a certain time a new tree grows. But beware: whenever you leave home a tree is cut down.

SLIDE3.TITLE: What's in it for me?
SLIDE3.PARAGRAPH: Compete against your neighbors and other people to see who can grow the largest forest by staying at home the most time possible.

SLIDE4.TITLE: See your forest in Virtual Reality
SLIDE4.PARAGRAPH: You can use the technologies in your phone to view your forest in Virtual Reality!

HOME.RULE1: Go to settings, click on "{{val1}}" and click on the button for "{{val2}}".
HOME.RULE2: One tree grows every {{val1}} seconds you stay at home.
HOME.RULE3: One tree is cut down every {{val1}} seconds you are not home.
HOME.RULE4: There are levels that you can achieve by growing a certain number of trees: 10, 20, 40, 80, etc.

NEWLEVEL.TITLE: Congratulations!
NEWLEVEL.MESSAGE: You have increased your forest level to {{val1}}!

LOSETREE.TITLE: Please return home
LOSETREE.MESSAGE: One tree has been cut down.

MODAL.TITLE: Please confirm
MODAL.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to delete all settings?
